author: 0xraino
content: Why not charge the cost of call data for all instances of those addresses in the access list?

author: lightclient
content: <@!213672586264051717> really no reason you couldn't do that, but also no reason people should have duplicates

author: 0xraino
content: I think it's worth it to do it like that since it'd actually be cleaner to implement generally instead of for just the first instances. Then we also get the added bonus of saving them some gas on a badly created access list
